name: Space Invaders: A New Threat
description:
Space Invaders: A New Threat Controls

Mobile:

    Movement: Left touch

    Shoot: Right touch

Keyboard:

    Movement: W, S, A , D

    Shoot: Space

A new threat emerges on this 3D version of Space Invader made in Unity. Game made for study purposes, you can check it out in my repository

Github repository

https://github.com/alerdn/space-invaders
